mapper.select: SELECT tb1.orgcode, -- 机构id DATE(#{date}) as date, IFNULL(tb2.wxpaymoney,0) as wxpaymoney, -- 微信支付总金额 IFNULL(tb2.wxpaynum,0) as wxpaynum, -- 微信支付次数 IFNULL(tb3.alipaymoney,0) as alipaymoney, -- 支付宝支付总金额 IFNULL(tb3.alipaynum,0) as alipaynum, -- 支付宝支付总金额 IFNULL(tb4.xianjin,0) as cash, -- 收款现金 IFNULL(tb4.xianjinnum,0) as cashnum, -- 收款现金 IFNULL(tb5.jiuzhennum,0) as registerednum, -- 就诊数 IFNULL(tb5.jiuzhenmoney,0) as registeredmoney, -- 就诊收入 IFNULL(tb8.chufangnum,0) as prescriptionnum, -- 处方数 IFNULL(tb8.chufangmoney,0) as prescriptionmoney, -- 处方收入 IFNULL(tb6.paynum,0) as paynum, -- 支付数 IFNULL(tb6.paymoney,0) as paymoney, -- 支付金额 IFNULL(tb7.refundnum,0) as refundnum,-- 退款次数 IFNULL(tb7.refundmoney,0) as refundmoney, -- 退款总金额 IFNULL(tb9.registeredrefundnum,0) as registeredrefundnum, -- 挂号退款数 IFNULL(tb9.registeredrefundmoney,0) as registeredrefundmoney, -- 挂号退款金额 IFNULL(tb10.prescriptionrefundnum,0) as prescriptionrefundnum, -- 处方退款数 IFNULL(tb10.prescriptionrefundmoney,0) as prescriptionrefundmoney -- 处方退款金额 FROM t_p_s_org tb1 LEFT JOIN (-- 微信支付 收入 和笔数 SELECT tb0.orgcode,SUM(tb0.fee) wxpaymoney,COUNT(tb0.id) wxpaynum FROM t_b_pay_statements tb0 WHERE tb0.feetype = 1 AND DATE(tb0.createat) = DATE(#{date}) GROUP BY tb0.orgcode ) as tb2 ON tb2.orgcode = tb1.orgcode LEFT JOIN (-- 支付宝支付 收入 和笔数 SELECT tb0.orgcode,SUM(tb0.fee) alipaymoney,COUNT(tb0.id) alipaynum FROM t_b_pay_statements tb0 WHERE tb0.feetype = 2 AND DATE(tb0.createat) = DATE(#{date}) GROUP BY tb0.orgcode ) as tb3 ON tb3.orgcode = tb1.orgcode LEFT JOIN (-- 现金 收入 和笔数 SELECT tb0.orgcode,SUM(tb0.fee) xianjin,COUNT(tb0.id) xianjinnum FROM t_b_pay_statements tb0 WHERE tb0.feetype = 0 AND DATE(tb0.createat) = DATE(#{date}) GROUP BY tb0.orgcode ) as tb4 ON tb4.orgcode = tb1.orgcode LEFT JOIN (-- 挂号 收入 和笔数 SELECT tb0.orgcode,COUNT(tb0.id) jiuzhennum ,SUM(tb0.fee) jiuzhenmoney FROM t_b_pay_statements tb0 WHERE tb0.source =1 AND DATE(tb0.createat) = DATE(#{date}) GROUP BY tb0.orgcode ) as tb5 ON tb5.orgcode = tb1.orgcode LEFT JOIN (-- 总 收入 和笔数 SELECT tb0.orgcode,COUNT(tb0.id) paynum,SUM(tb0.fee) paymoney FROM t_b_pay_statements tb0 WHERE DATE(tb0.createat) = DATE(#{date}) GROUP BY tb0.orgcode ) as tb6 ON tb6.orgcode = tb1.orgcode LEFT JOIN ( -- 总 退款 和笔数 SELECT tb0.orgcode,COUNT(tb0.id) refundnum,SUM(tb0.fee) refundmoney FROM t_b_pay_refuse tb0 WHERE DATE(tb0.createat) = DATE(#{date}) GROUP BY tb0.orgcode ) as tb7 ON tb7.orgcode = tb1.orgcode LEFT JOIN (-- 处方 收入和笔数 SELECT tb0.orgcode,COUNT(tb0.id) chufangnum ,SUM(tb0.fee) chufangmoney FROM t_b_pay_statements tb0 WHERE tb0.source =2 AND DATE(tb0.createat) = DATE(#{date}) GROUP BY tb0.orgcode ) as tb8 ON tb8.orgcode = tb1.orgcode LEFT JOIN ( -- 挂号退款 和笔数 SELECT tb0.orgcode,COUNT(tb0.id) registeredrefundnum,SUM(tb0.fee) registeredrefundmoney FROM t_b_pay_refuse tb0 WHERE tb0.source =1 AND DATE(tb0.createat) = DATE(#{date}) GROUP BY tb0.orgcode ) as tb9 ON tb9.orgcode = tb1.orgcode LEFT JOIN ( -- 处方退款 和笔数 SELECT tb0.orgcode,COUNT(tb0.id) prescriptionrefundnum,SUM(tb0.fee) prescriptionrefundmoney FROM t_b_pay_refuse tb0 WHERE tb0.source =2 AND DATE(tb0.createat) = DATE(#{date}) GROUP BY tb0.orgcode ) as tb10 ON tb10.orgcode = tb1.orgcode
SELECT tb1.* FROM t_r_water_day tb1 WHERE DATE(tb1.date) = DATE(#{date})
SELECT * FROM t_r_water_day WHERE orgcode = #{orgCode} AND DATE(date) BETWEEN DATE(#{startTime})AND DATE(#{endTime})
SELECT * FROM t_r_water_day WHERE orgcode = #{orgCode} AND date_format(date,'%Y-%m') = date_format(#{date},'%Y-%m')

select t1.orgcode, DATE_FORMAT(t1.date,'%Y-%m') date, SUM(wxpaymoney) wxpaymoney, SUM(wxpaynum) wxpaynum, SUM(alipaymoney) alipaymoney, SUM(alipaynum) alipaynum, SUM(cash) cash, SUM(cashnum) cashnum, SUM(registerednum) registerednum, SUM(registeredmoney) registeredmoney, SUM(prescriptionnum) prescriptionnum, SUM(prescriptionmoney) prescriptionmoney, SUM(paynum) paynum, SUM(paymoney) paymoney, SUM(refundnum) refundnum, SUM(refundmoney) refundmoney, SUM(registeredrefundnum) registeredrefundnum, SUM(registeredrefundmoney) registeredrefundmoney, SUM(prescriptionrefundnum) prescriptionrefundnum, SUM(prescriptionrefundmoney) prescriptionrefundmoney FROM t_r_water_day t1 WHERE orgcode = #{orgCode} AND YEAR(date) = YEAR(#{date}) GROUP BY MONTH(date)

SELECT id,isin as isIn,fee,feetype feeType,source,createat time FROM ( SELECT id , 1 as isin , fee ,feetype ,source,createat FROM t_b_pay_statements WHERE orgcode =#{orgCode} AND DATE(createat) BETWEEN DATE(#{startTime}) AND DATE(#{endTime}) UNION ALL SELECT id , 0 as isin , fee ,feetype ,source,createat FROM t_b_pay_refuse WHERE orgcode = #{orgCode} AND DATE(createat) BETWEEN DATE(#{startTime}) AND DATE(#{endTime}) )tmp ORDER BY createat DESC
